_header: Almighty God in Trinity / One God and persons three
_description: The metrical version of Mandeville’s Travels — 2947 lines in couplets

CovAcc3251.First Lines:
Almyghti god in treniteOo god and persoones
                    thre…
CovAcc3251.Last Lines:
…That noone of ham is more than oþereThough a man shulde
                    bie hit of his broþere
CovAcc3251.Attributed Title: Here biginnith the boke of Mawndevile (f. 77va)

Seymour,  M. C.,
                        ed.
